name: GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer)
description: GPT is an advanced language processing AI developed by OpenAI. It is used to understand and generate human-like text based on the input provided. Designed to assist in tasks ranging from simple text completion to full-scale content generation, it is often employed in applications requiring natural language understanding and synthetic text generation. The model is based on a neural network architecture and trained on diverse internet text. It can be utilized for a variety of applications including chatbots, automated customer support, content creation, and more.
